IOCL Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 537 Apprentice Posts
Harshitha / All Government Jobs / Aug 29, 2025, 16:11 IST
 Indian Oil Corporation Limited
 537 Jobs |  Posted On : 29-Aug-2025 |  Delhi |  Salary : 7,000 to 9,000




FOLLOW

The Indian Oil Corporation Limited (IOCL) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 537 Technician Apprentice, Trade Apprentice, and Data Entry Operator Jobs. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their ITI, 12th, Diploma, B.E./B. Tech in Electronics, Mechanical Engineering can apply for the IOCL Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary, and how to apply for these posts before the deadline. The application dates have already begun.




If you are more interested in Government Jobs, candidates can also apply for jobs in Delhi.

IOCL Recruitment 2025 Eligiblity Criteria:
Name of the Posts	Vacancies	Education
Technician Apprentice	537	ITI, 12th, Diploma in Electrical, Mechanical Engineering
Trade Apprentice	Any Degree
Data Entry Operator	12th

IOCL Recruitment 2025 Age Limit:

The minimum age limit: 18 Years.
The maximum age limit: 24 Years.

Age Relaxation:

OBC Candidates: 3 Years
SC, ST Candidates: 5 Years
PWD Candidates: 10 Years

IOCL Recruitment 2025 Selection Process:

The selection process is based on Merit.

IOCL Recruitment 2025 Application Fee:

There is no application fee.

IOCL Recruitment 2025 Pay Scale:

The minimum salary: Rs. 7,000/- per month.
The maximum salary: Rs. 9,000/- per month.
How to Apply for the IOCL Recruitment 2025:
Go to the official website.
Visit the IOCL Recruitment 2025 notification.
Read the instructions carefully and check the eligiblity criteria.
Fill out the application form without any mistakes.
Pay the application fee(if needed).
Attach the required documents to the filled application form.
Submit the filled application form before the last date.
Download & take a printout of the filled application form for further use.

Important Dates:

Starting date	29-08-2025
Closing date	18-09-2025

 

Official Notification	Click Here
Apply Online	Click Here
